ClassDesc: use @B_android#support#v17#leanback#app#BrowseSupportFragment_E@ Factory class responsible for creating fragment given the current item. @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#ListRow_E@ should return @B_android#support#v17#leanback#app#RowsFragment_E@ or its subclass whereas @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#PageRow_E@ can return any fragment class.
